name: The Rumble Fish 2
description: The Rumble Fish 2 (ザ・ランブルフィッシュ) is a 2D fighting game for the Atomiswave arcade platform. It was produced by Dimps and published by Sammy. It is the sequel to The Rumble Fish, bringing in several new additions. A re-release on Taito's NESiCAxLive arcade digital delivery service was made available in 2012. In 2020, a homebrew conversion was released for the Dreamcast.
